## Presentaciones

```{r echo = F, results = 'asis'}
slides = dir('slides', full = TRUE)
links = paste0("- ", 
  "[", basename(slides), "]", "(", slides, "/index.html)"
)
last <- length(links)
last2 <- length(links) - 1
writeLines(links[-c(1, last, last2)])
```
